title: Rudolph mince pies
description: These fun mince pies have a lovely almond filling and are topped with a glacé cherry – perfect for kids (or Santa!).Equipment and preparation: You will need a food processor, circular pastry cutters and a 12-hole muffin tray
ingredients: 250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
125g/4½oz cold unsalted butter, cut into cubes, plus extra for greasing
1 x 210g jar good-quality mincemeat (or use homemade)
